    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(CommandExecutor player,
           String name,
           String message)
        Execute a command. This will check permissions to see if player can execute the command based on the group the player is in.
        Parameters:
        player - The client that is executing the command
        name - The name of the command
        message - The append arguments as a String

      • find

        public Command find(String name)
        Find a command based on the name. This will also look for shortcuts
        Parameters:
        name - The name/shortcut of the command
        Returns:
        The Command object

      • execute

        public void execute(CommandExecutor player,
           String command,
           String[] args)
        Have player execute a command. This method will check for group permissions, if the player can't execute the command, the player will be notified.
        Parameters:
        player - The player executing the command
        command - The command the player will use
        args - Any arguments that will be passed to this command

      • addCommand

        public void addCommand(Command cmd)
        Add a command to the command list. This will load permissions for this command, if no permissions are found for it, it will save the default permissions for it.
        Parameters:
        cmd - The command to add.

      • removeCommand

        public void removeCommand(Command cmd)
        Remove a command from the list
        Parameters:
        cmd - The command to remove

      • removeCommand

        public void removeCommand(String name)
        Remove a command from the list.
        Parameters:
        name - The command name.

      • setDefaults

        public void setDefaults(Command c)
